scroll_list.name: object_list
scroll_list.tool_tip: Select an object from this list to highlight it in-world

column.name: object_name
column.label: Object Name
column.tool_tip: Name of the primitive (names in bold are for root primitives).

column.name: owner_name
column.label: Owner Name
column.tool_tip: Name of the current owner of the primitive.

column.name: last_owner_name
column.label: Last Owner Name
column.tool_tip: Name of the previous owner of the primitive.

column.name: creator_name
column.label: Creator Name
column.tool_tip: Name of the avatar who created the primitive.

column.name: creation_date
column.label: Creation Date
column.tool_tip: Date at which the primitive was created.

column.name: inventory
column.label: Scripts/Tot
column.tool_tip: Number of scripts in the primitive/Total number of inventory items in the primitive.

button.name: button owner
button.label: See Owner Profile...
button.tool_tip: See profile of the highlighted object's owner.

button.name: button creator
button.label: See Creator Profile...
button.tool_tip: See profile of the highlighted object's original creator.

button.name: button weights
button.label: See Object Weights...
button.tool_tip: See the weights of the object (number of primitives, land impact, physics and streaming costs).
